bullets: My first year as a TechStart intern I used Snowflake Native Apps and Streamlit to develop a proof-of-concept app enabling users to easily interact with data within Snowflake via a user-friendly and accessible UI.
My second year as an intern I am working with my team of developers to modernize CI/CD infrastructure by migrating depolyment pipelines to GitHub Actions.
Managing editor of digital: I help to lead my team of web developers to design and create multimedia projects and data graphics to deliver impactful narratives online.

Web developer: [Little 500 guide 2025](https://specials.idsnews.com/little-500-guide-2025/index.html) • [Solar eclipse guide 2024](https://www.idsnews.com/article/2024/03/your-local-guide-to-the-2024-solar-eclipse) • [The crows return](https://www.idsnews.com/article/2024/02/the-crows-return) • [more!](https://www.idsnews.com/staff/matei-cloteaux)
